page.title: 02HOMELIFE-EDUCATION-LIFESTYLE
page.content: I wake up at seven o'clock in the morning and have breakfast with my Mum,Dad and younger sister.For breakfast we have cereal,toast and tea.My Dad leaves for work at seven forty.He works inthe stock department of a company which makes tractor parts.At eight thirty I walk to school with my Mum and sister and we go straight into class and do the work on the blackboard.My Mum goes home then to look after the house.She is a nurse and works two evenings a week at a local hospital.At school we do maths,english,geography,history,art,mu sic,and games.I have lunch at school at midday.The lunches are cooked at a school in St.Neots and brought to our school in metal containers.After school,I play with my friends.
